```{r, echo = FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("magrittr"))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library("plotlyutils"))
```



```{r, fig.caption = "Density plot of counts"}
mat <- GBMdata@assays[[1]]
colnames(mat) <- rownames(GBMdata@colData)
plotly_density(
    log2(mat + 0.5), 
    palette=colorspace::rainbow_hcl,
    xlab = "log<sub>2</sub>(reads + 0.5)") %>% 
    layout(showlegend = FALSE)

```
```{r, fig.caption = "Voomed density"}
plotly_density(
    voomed_GBM$E, 
    palette=colorspace::rainbow_hcl,
    xlab = "log<sub>2</sub>(normalised counts per million)") %>%
    layout(showlegend = FALSE)


```
